briefTitle: Evaluation of Prucalopride in Male Subjects With Chronic Constipation.
officialTitle: A 12-week, Randomised, Double-blind, Placebo-controlled Trial to Evaluate the Efficacy, Quality of Life, Safety and Tolerability of Prucalopride in Male Subjects With Chronic Constipation
summary:
This is a multi-centre, randomised, parallel-group, double-blind, placebo-controlled phase III trial to evaluate the efficacy of prucalopride versus placebo over 12 weeks of treatment in male subjects with chronic constipation.

Furthermore the safety, tolerability, effect on quality of life and effect on symptoms of prucalopride will be assessed.

primaryOutcome.measure: The Percentage of Subjects With an Average of â‰¥3 Spontaneous Complete Bowel Movements (SCBM) Per Week
